pages.text: $(li)Shroomloins can be found in the Crimson Forests of the Nether.$(br)$(li)They shoot Ascus Bombs that explode and produce an Infectious Poison, spreading among entities that brush against one another and killing them.$(br)$(li)The may drop Ascus Bombs on death.
$(li)Be careful, these creatures will attack you if you dare to damage the Crimson Forest.$(br)$(li)This includes breaking any of the blocks found withit it besides Crimson Nylium and Shroomlights.
